violations: Workers in potentially dangerous positions (unsecured areas near materials)
locations: Workers in the center and left without visible hard hats or vests
Workers in the center walking between stacked materials
Stacked materials on the right with potential risk of collapse
recommendations: Ensure all workers wear appropriate PPE, including hard hats and safety vests.
Restrict access to unsecured areas and ensure all pathways are clear and safe.
Properly secure and organize materials to prevent collapse or accidents.
